s.text: i you know i wish i had the time to read all the stories in the newspaper but i just can't seem to find the time if they'd put it out in a video or on not a video but a cassette tape or something where you could just listen to it i would do that while i was doing other things
well during see i'm going to school right now and uh while i'm working i don't get a i don't get a chance to read the paper a lot
